content: what inspired me to make this version was when i made a few of the big yip yip by carissa browning it was my sister which asked me if i could make some mini ones for her after she saw the big ones she wants to put them in her christmas tree using christmas colours so i recalculated the number of stitches and row and this is the results here are my notes in a neater fashion enjoy erreta… on row 20 there is a typo it says at the end of row 20 single_crochet sec in last 2 sts but it is supposed to be single_crochet decrease in last 2 sts
